name: Melissa Bonny
description:
'''Melissa Bonny''' (born 23 January 1993) is a Swiss singer, best known for being the founder and vocalist of the symphonic metal band [[Ad Infinitum (Swiss band)|Ad Infinitum]]. She is also the vocalist of The Dark Side of the Moon and former vocalist of Evenmore and Rage of Light. She also gained some popularity by recording music as well as touring with various bands such as [[Kamelot]], [[Feuerschwanz]], Rock Meets Classic and more.

Bonny possesses a [[mezzo-soprano]] voice. She also masters [[Death growl|guttural]] singing, to which she switches within songs.
